name: Reclaim the Darkness Mobile Game
blurb: RD is a card-fighting game. The little rookie princess,Lilith,tryed to defeat the local lairds and recapture her territory

rewards.reward: Karmic Thanks \r\n============================== \r\nYou can rest easy knowing that you have helped fund this game and receive a little karmic boost from the universe.
Your name in our site! \r\n============================== \r\nLet everyone know that you help this game be born!

The art of Reclaim of Darkness(e-book),free game download point. Beta of early-stage mobile-version game.
============================== 
Get one copy of The art of Reclaim of Darkness(e-book)
And you can join our final closed beta testing session.

The standard Digital Bundle\uff1a\r\n============================== \r\nAt this level you will receive the rewards of the standard digital bundle including the one copy of The art of Reclaim of Darkness(e-book) and Mobile-version game. Plus you can Choose three payment characters in your team, except the two primary characters, \u201cLilith Night\u201d and \u201cMaggie Knowledge\u201d.

Standard Digital Bundle: All character!\r\n============================== \r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the standard digital bundle including the one copy of The art of Reclaim of Darkness(e-book) and Mobile-version game. Plus you can get all payment characters in your team!

An Early Bird Basic Bundle\uff1a\r\n============================== \r\nAt this level you will receive all of the the rewards of the Standard Digital Bundle including the e-Book and Mobile-version game, and all the payment characters with all special costumes that make power-up!

Basic Bundle\uff1a\r\n============================== \r\nAt this level you will receive all of the the rewards of the Standard Digital Bundle including the e-Book  and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes.

A Luxurious Bundle\uff1a\r\n============================== \r\nAt this level you will receive all of the the rewards of the Early Bird Basic Bundle including the e-Book and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, and the download link of soundtrack. Plus you will get the download link of the Final soundtrack.

An Early Bird Physical Bundle : choose one item from three：T-shirt, iPhone case and Limited Character!
============================== 
At this level you will receive all of the the rewards of the Luxurious Bundle including the e-Book and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, and the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack.
Plus you will also choose two in T-shirt, iPhone case and limited characters. T-shirt has 6 versions, in S, M, L and XL, while iPhone case has two styles. You can choose before we send it.  Limited Character only appears in this activity. All of which will be sent out at the end of the campaign.

Physical Bundle! choose one item from three\uff1a T-shirt, iPhone Case, Limited Character! \r\n====================================\r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the Early Bird Luxurious Bundle including the e-Book and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, and the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack. Plus you can get one product, including T-shirt, iPhone Case and Limited Characters.

An Early Bird Epic Bundle:\r\n====================================\r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the Early Bird Luxurious Bundle including the e-Book and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack,  T-shirt, iPhone Case and Limited Characters (all three!). Plus you can get softcover color edition soundtrack CD and Original PC-version DVD. Both CD and DVD will be signed.

An Epic Bundle:\r\n====================================\r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the Early Bird Luxurious Bundle including the PC-version and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack,  T-shirt, iPhone Case and Limited Characters (all three!). Plus you can get softcover color edition soundtrack CD and Original PC-version DVD. Both CD and DVD will be signed.

Name the NPC! : \r\n====================================\r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the Epic Bundle including the PC-version and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack,  T-shirt, iPhone Case, Limited Characters (all three!), softcover CD, original DVD. Plus you can name the NPC with your favorite name and add an introducing sentence. Ex. Skeleton Chris, \u201cI prefer corruption food to human.\u201d Besides, we will show the name and the localtion (state and city only) of designer if you would and use this character in the game! NPC\u2019s character is designed by us. The sentence can\u2019t be attacking or seditious.

Design character costume!:\r\n====================================\r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the Epic Bundle including the PC-version and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack,  T-shirt, iPhone Case, Limited Characters (all three!), softcover CD, original DVD. Plus you can design a new costume for a character in this game. We would design the costume according to your description, and this costume will be used in game, and you and your three friends will get this costume free. Besides, we would show your name, located state and city if you would.

Design a new image character for your ieda!\r\n====================================\r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the Epic Bundle including the PC-version and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack,  T-shirt, iPhone Case, Limited Characters (all three!), softcover CD, original DVD. Plus you can design a new character. We would design the character according to your description. The designed character must be a female. You can describe that character\u2019s story and mantra. That character will be put in our site and poster, and be used in activities. Note that it will NOT be used in our game.  Besides, we would show your name, located state and city if you would.

Only one person! Design a new character in game!\r\n====================================\r\nAt this level you will receive all of the rewards of the Epic Bundle including the PC-version and Mobile-version game, with all the payment characters and all special costumes, the download link of soundtrack and Final soundtrack,  T-shirt, iPhone Case, Limited Characters (all three!), softcover CD, original DVD. Plus you can design a new character. We would design the character\u2019s all images in game according to your description. The designed character must be a female. You can describe her images, lines, favorite things, skill name, and the most important, her story. She will be put in our game, and you and your five friends will get this character free. Besides, we would show your name, located state and city if you would.
